name: Comfyco Furniture Inc.
overview: Modern Discount Furniture Store. For the Living Room: Modern Leather Sofas, Classic Leather Sofas, Sectional Sofas, Fabric Sofas, Sleepers, Sofabeds, Chairs, Loungers, Recliners, Ottomans, Coffee Tables, Accent Tables, Displays, TV Stands, Wall-Units, Accessories, Area Rugs, SPECIAL ORDER SOFA. For the Bedroom: Modern Bedroom Sets, Classic Bedroom Sets, Modern Beds, Daybeds, Mattresses, Accessories, Vanities, Chests, Armoires, Bedding Sets, SPECIAL ORDER BED. For the Dining Room: Family Dining Sets, Casual Dining Sets, Counter Height Dining Sets, Buffets, Cabinets, China, Dining Chairs, Bars and Stools, Restaurant Dining, Classic Dining Table Sets. For the Office: Office Collections, Reception Furniture, Office Desks, Computer Chairs, Bookcases, File Cabinets. For Youth: Kids Collections, Kids Seating, Kids Dining Sets, Kids Bedroom, and Kids Computer Furniture.
